Literature Geek smarter online communities via digital humanities

All blog posts by topic or date

Posts by topic

  • digital humanities: All digital humanities posts
  • dissertation: All posts about/during my Ph.D. Dissertation (successfully defended in Spring 2015; see Dr.AmandaVisconti.com for the dissertation and InfiniteUlysses.com for the finished digital+social reading platform)
  • Infinite Ulysses: All posts about Infinite Ulysses (during and after the dissertation based on it)
  • featured on DH Now!: All posts featured on Digital Humanities Now
  • best: A curated selection of my best/favorite blog posts
  • scholarly web design and coding: All posts on scholarly web design and coding
  • Gephi: All posts on using Gephi for information visualization
  • usertesting: All posts related to usertesting, usability, and other user/site metrics and analysis
  • textual scholarship: All posts related to textual scholarship, scholarly editing, digital editions, weird texts, etc.
  • advice/tutorial: Tutorials for web development, Gephi information visualization (want just Gephi posts?), etc. as well as advice for people curious about the digital humanities
  • James Joyce & Ulysses: All posts about James Joyce and/or Ulysses
  • advice for grad students: Advice for graduate students on doing a digital dissertation, project management, etc.

Posts by date

Note that some earlier posts have been retired; contact me if you’re having trouble finding something old, as I might have an offline copy to share.
